title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Jan 10 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 10 January 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................

From the Infowars web site :: On this Friday, January 10 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex uncovers the latest in government hypocrisy and cover-ups. The State of California is now downplaying the radiation discovered on beaches in California, which are 12 to 14 times above safe levels, as "normal" and not being a threat to public health. Jakari Jackson and the Infowars crew continue their investigation into the radiation in Oregon as Fukushima's dangerous plume begins to reach the American west coast. 

American legal theorist Elizabeth Price Foley also joins the show to specifically break down how Obama is violating the Constitution and to reveal Rep. Tom Rice's proposed resolution to bring the executive branch to court.

NOTE: Though not mentioned in the official show description, Alex's guest for most of the second hour and the first segment of the third hourd is Dr. Group -- the developer of the Survival ShieldÃ¢â€žÂ¢ iodine that Alex sells at InfowarsLife.com. Group's appearances on the show could be regarded as an "infomercial" for the various products available on that web site (today particularly Super Male VitalityÃ¢â€žÂ¢. It's virtually impossible to edit out "commercials" when they're about an hour long.

 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
